reviewText:
With all the vulgar language on TV, I started purchasing the old B&W movies to have something to watch.

I am really enjoying this.  Have purchased more.

I found that on each of these DVDs there is one movie that is not so good, but that is just my taste.  For the price, three out of four film noir are excellent.  An excellent buy for mystery buffs who like the black and white classics.

This item is packaged so as to mislead the purchaser.  The cover indicates  that the features are Sherlock Holmes movies.  Since I am a collector of Sherlock Holmes Movies starring Basil Rathbone and Nigel Bruce, I leapt at the opportunity to get titles that I did not have.  When I got the DVD, I found to my surprise that of the 4 movies on the DVD, only 1 was Sherlock homes and I already had that one in my collection.  I was hoping that I was going to receive 3 new movies so I dismissed that I already had one of the movies, which, by the way, was the only Sherlock Holmes feature on the disc.
I am very satisfied with this purchase.
I like old mystery movies and for this price it's a must have. Good movie.
This was okay; but was a little disappointed that there was not more Sherlock Holmes stories.
If you like the old Sherlock Holmes you will not be disappointed .  It's not all Basil Rathbone and Nigil Bruce but for us as we enjoy the oldies it was great.
NICE

What can you say about Sherlock Holmes that hasn't been said before? They are the best of the past with this duo of Nigel Bruce (the dunce) and Basil Rathbone ( the all knowing). A team made in heaven who will live forever.
Great old mysterys

It i difficult to evaluate several movies under one umbrella. I have the whole series, and every one generally has a good entry, a notso good entry and the rest aveage entries. This s one of best because it contains a Basil Rathbon Sherlock Holmes
I really love the old mystery movies and when I saw this vol. I just had to get it. I love Sherlock Holmes movies any way. i will be getting the other vols as well.

I liked these movies. The quality of the film at times wasn't that great, but these movies are good to settle down with when you're doing handwork and there's nothing else on TV. Great service from amazon.
Good old shows, have seen them done a million times but still enjoy
NOT THE BEST PICTURE QUALITY
great
as stated
Great classics!!!!!
good films enjoyed it
It's fun to see these old movies again. I'm 74 years old
If you love only hard to find classics, this series does the job. Great way to see past ideas and culture, too, while being entertained.
Great "Late, Late Show" type movies.  Not blockbusters, but good, solid entertainment from a more innocent era.  At this price, you can't go wrong.
I love all Sherlock holmes movies so I know this will be excellent its my American indian feeling
